property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 2 less to summon if you evolve it from a tamaseed. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your RexStars in your shield zone get "shield trigger". ■ If you have 5 or more shields, this creature can't leave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a total of 3 of your untapped tamaseeds (including at least one light tamaseed). If you do, put this card from your hand. {STAR MAX EVOLUTION} When you would lose the game, destroy this creature or discard a Savark-MAX from your hand. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest of your hand.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■Your creatures can't be destroyed while blocking.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ You may draw a card at the end of your turn. If you do, discard a card from your hand. ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, you may destroy this tamaseed. If you do, put a water creature that costs 6 or less from your hand and it gets "blocker" until the end of your turn. At the end of this turn, return that creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, each player shieldifies the top 2 cards of their deck. ■ If you have 5 or more shields, this creature gets +5000 power and "double breaker". ■ Whenever one of your shields break, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses 3 of their shields and puts the rest into their graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy them. Then your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses 3 of their shields and puts the rest into their graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy them. Then your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may search your deck. If you do, reveal any number of "Raios Gun Oni's Seal" to your opponent, put them into your hand and shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a card in the battle zone, you choose instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a total of 3 of your untapped tamaseeds (including at least one light tamaseed). If you do, put this card from your hand. {STAR MAX EVOLUTION} When you would lose the game, destroy this creature or discard a Savark-MAX from your hand. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest of your hand.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■Your creatures can't be destroyed while blocking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if it evolved from a tamaseed, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 5 or less or a tamaseed that costs 5 or less. ■ Whenever a card is put into your opponent's graveyard from anywhere during your turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite Star Evolution: Put on any number of your RexStars or water creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +2000 for each card under it. ■ Whenever you use a tamaseed, you may put it under this creature. ■ After this creature attacks, you may choose 6 cards under it and shuffle them onto the bottom of your deck. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, each player shieldifies the top 2 cards of their deck. ■ If you have 5 or more shields, this creature gets +5000 power and "double breaker". ■ Whenever one of your shields break, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, draw a card. ■ During your turn, whenever you draw a card, look at the top card of your deck. You may reveal it face up until the end of the turn. ■ During your turn, you may summon face up evolution creatures from the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Darkness creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ You may put up to one card in your hand, shield, creature and tamaseed into your graveyard. This creature costs one less to summon for that chosen number. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 4 tamaseeds that have a total cost of 6 or less from your graveyard. ■ You may summon this creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, return a water or darkness card from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Whenever a card leaves your graveyard for the first time each turn, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses and discards a card from their hand: ► Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Ultimate Star Evolution: Put on one of your Fire evolution creatures or RexStars evolution creatures. Those creatures battle: ► Destroy a non-creature card.

property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature, if you have more cards in your mana zone than your opponent, your opponent puts that creature into their mana zone instead. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each card in your mana zone. ■ Whenever your opponent's creature attacks, they attack this creature if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, if your opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, draw a card. If your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If your opponent has more shields than you do, shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a creature that has power 6000 or more, this spell costs 2 less to cast. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped: ► Choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Those creatures battle: ► Destroy a non-creature card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards. ■ Whenever you use a tamaseed from your hand, you may use a tamaseed that costs less than that tamaseed from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or darkness creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Whenever you use a tamaseed, you may put an evolution creature that costs 4 or less that can evolve from that tamaseed from your graveyard on top of that tamaseed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may destroy one of your tamaseeds. If you do, put a tamaseed that costs 4 or less from your graveyard. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this tamaseed evolves, you may choose a creature or tamaseed in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever one of your evolution creatures is destroyed, if you don't have a 'U.S.A. AIDORU' in the battle zone, you may put this creature from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, your opponent can only attack with creatures twice during their turn until the start of your next turn. ■ At the start of your turn, if this tamaseed is in your graveyard and you don't have 'Change's Vision' in the battle zone, you may put this tamaseed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Each player puts the rest of their creatures into their owner's mana zone. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature, if your opponent put 2 or more other creatures that turn, your opponent puts that creature into their mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or darkness creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever your opponent would look at or reveal one or more cards from their deck, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, break one of your shields for each of your tamaseeds. (You can use the "shield trigger".)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures and/or tamaseeds. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. Then destroy one of your opponent's creature that costs less than the discarded card. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this tamaseed evolves, you may choose a shield and break it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose a player. That player shuffles their graveyard and put it the bottom of their deck. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this tamaseed evolves, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent chooses one of the following: ► Your opponent taps all cards in their mana zone. At the start of your opponent's next turn, they don't untap. ► Your opponent destroys all their creatures.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or nature creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures can't be blocked by creatures that have less power. ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose one of your creatures. Until the end of the turn, double that creature's power and it gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Each player puts the rest of their creatures into their owner's mana zone. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature, if your opponent put 2 or more other creatures that turn, your opponent puts that creature into their mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may search your deck and put a light or water evolution creature from among it that costs the same as or less than the number of your tamaseeds. If you do, shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever one of your evolution creatures attacks, you may draw a card and shieldify the top card of your deck. This ability can only be used once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead. ■ If you have a tamaseed, this creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this tamaseed evolves, the evolved creature gets "mach fighter" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses 3 of their shields and puts the rest into their graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy them. Then your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a total of 3 of your untapped tamaseeds (including at least one light tamaseed). If you do, put this card from your hand. {STAR MAX EVOLUTION} When you would lose the game, destroy this creature or discard a Savark-MAX from your hand. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest of your hand.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■Your creatures can't be destroyed while blocking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, each player shieldifies the top 2 cards of their deck. ■ If you have 5 or more shields, this creature gets +5000 power and "double breaker". ■ Whenever one of your shields break, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite Star Evolution: Put on any number of your RexStars or water creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +2000 for each card under it. ■ Whenever you use a tamaseed, you may put it under this creature. ■ After this creature attacks, you may choose 6 cards under it and shuffle them onto the bottom of your deck. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Darkness creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ You may put up to one card in your hand, shield, creature and tamaseed into your graveyard. This creature costs one less to summon for that chosen number. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 4 tamaseeds that have a total cost of 6 or less from your graveyard. ■ You may summon this creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your creatures attacks your opponent, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle. ■ Whenever one of your creatures wins a battle, you may destroy one of your opponent's non-creature cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Ultimate Star Evolution: Put on one of your Fire evolution creatures or RexStars evolution creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {INFINITY BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy up to 2 creatures that have power 25000 or less. ■ When this card leaves, you may put an evolution creature that costs 6 or less from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature, if you have more cards in your mana zone than your opponent, your opponent puts that creature into their mana zone instead. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each card in your mana zone. ■ Whenever your opponent's creature attacks, they attack this creature if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your turn, add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Fire dragon that costs 5 or more {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ At the end of your turn, untap all your multicolored creatures. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Choose any number of non-evolution multicolored creatures from among them that have total cost 6 or less and put them into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature , choose a creature card name except 'Emotional Hardcore, Sacred Dragon'. ■ Ignore any abilities of creatures that have the chosen name. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, if you have another Oracle, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand or graveyard for no cost. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ At the end of each of your turns, if you cast a spell that turn, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5500 or less, destroy it, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Light or Water creature (When one of your Light or Water creatures attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a light or water spell that costs 3 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell that costs 4 or less from your graveyard for no cost. ■ Whenever you cast a spell for the first time each turn, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)
